services.name: Internet Bill
services.description:
Pay internet bills, with Go Driveline manager.

 With go driveline we will come to your house and pay your bills, which will help you pay all your bills with internet account. No need of having your credit card details anymore you can use our manager who will manage your entire bill payment. It's free with monthly go driveline subscription fee

services.name: Milk Service
services.description:
Go Driveline deliver you fresh organic milk which directly comes from the farm without and water mixed. 100% Purity Gauranteed.

 The price difference depends on various things like amount of fat precent in the milk, the favour of the milk, cow or buffalo milk, etc. So before you buy it's good if you tell us the purpose and the use of the milk so that we can suggest the best milk for the best things which you are making. We have expert milk specialists.

services.name: Cleaning Service
services.description:
Go Driveline gives you cleaning service which means cleaning every room including bathroom, hall, bed rooms and kitchen. The price depends on the size of your house or office.

 Our manager will manage the entire process so you don't have to worry anything just relax and the work is done you don't have todo anything all the work is perfect managed by our manager.

services.name: Electricity Bill
services.description:
Don't worry about the bills anymore we will come and pay your electricity bill for you, you don't have to spend your valuable time on paying electricity bill.

 We will take care of everything we will come monthly and check your bill and pay them on time. You don't have to worry anymore and even forget that you were paying for electricity we come and pay the bills.

services.name: Laundry Services
services.description: We give the best value for money laundry service which no one in the city can give which comes with insurance on the dress. We will take care of your dress like that is ours.

services.name: Carpenter
services.description: If you have any carpenter work we are ready to do it. We have the best and most professional team of carpenenter. If you have repairs or want to make your new furniture for your home or office we will be there and help you with the task.

services.name: Plumber
services.description: We provide the best plumber whom you can trust and won't cheat you like your earlier plumbers. The plumbers we have come with the tools and they will give you free service. Only if there is any equipment we will charge so don't worry and just call our plumber.

services.name: Interior Decorators/Designers
services.description: We have world class interior decoraters to ordinary arrangment people. If you are inviting your friends and you think your house is messed up with all the things and crap. You can go with go driveline manage who will help you with various things in your house and arrange things.

services.name: Doctors
services.description: We have all types of doctors who are ready to answer your query within 10 mins. So you don't have to go to doctor anymore you can talk to your family doctor. If you have one. If you don't have one you can get a new family doctor using go driveline. If anything is complex we will arrange a schedule with doctor immediately.
